thread.title: Adidas Stock: Shares Near Record High Amid Strong Growth
thread.title_full: Adidas Stock: Shares Near Record High Amid Strong Growth

author: aktiencheck.de AG
title: Adidas Stock: Shares Near Record High Amid Strong Growth
text:
Adidas shares demonstrated remarkable momentum in recent trading, climbing 0.6 percent to reach €246.20, approaching the 52-week peak of €247.40 recorded on January 8, 2025. This impressive performance marks a substantial recovery of over 53 percent from the February 2024 low of €160.20. The company's robust financial results underpin this upward trajectory, with third-quarter 2024 earnings per share surging to €2.48, significantly outperforming the previous year's €1.45. Revenue growth remained strong, increasing by 7.32 percent to €6.44 billion, while market capitalization now stands at €44.1 billion.
Strategic Sports Partnership Fuels Growth
Adding to the company's positive momentum, Adidas has secured a groundbreaking multi-year sponsorship agreement with the Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS Formula 1 team. This strategic move marks the company's first venture into Formula 1 racing, opening new opportunities in the motorsport sector and potentially contributing to future growth prospects.
Ad
